commit.message:
i386.c (ix86_md_asm_adjust): Handle DImode dest_mode for !TARGET_64BIT.

	* config/i386/i386.c (ix86_md_asm_adjust): Handle DImode dest_mode
	for !TARGET_64BIT.

testsuite/ChangeLog:

	* gcc.target/i386/asm-flag-5.c (f_ll): New.

From-SVN: r226017
